meanings.definition: The action or process of working together with others for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The school project was successful due to the students' cooperations.
meanings.sent2: Teamwork requires good cooperations among all members.
meanings.sent3: The animals showed great cooperations in building their nest together.
meanings.sent4: The flowers and bees have a natural cooperation in pollination.
meanings.sent5: The firefighters' cooperation saved the day during the emergency.

meanings.definition: The act of being helpful or useful.
meanings.sent1: Her cooperation in the group assignment was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The cooperation of the volunteers made the event run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The cooperation of the tools in the workshop made the job easier.
meanings.sent4: The cooperation of the ingredients resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The cooperation of the gears kept the machine running efficiently.
